wikipedia_page.main: William Llewellyn Morgan (1 January 1884 – 11 April 1960) was a Welsh international rugby union halfback who played club rugby for Cardiff. Morgan played international rugby for Wales and in 1908 was selected to join Arthur Harding's Anglo-Welsh tour of New Zealand and Australia.

response: * William Llewellyn Morgan (1884–1960), international rugby union player
